snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda  - Echoes of Aurelia Teaser Video 2
snippet.description:
Part 2 is just a few odds and ends which add some nice touches to the game - nothing too fancy.
Here we can see that the boomerang and the bombs can cut grass (and bushes), there's a nice little shake when a bomb blows, the magic wand leaves behind a little 'puff' when it hits a solid combo (no projectiles can pass through solid combos), and the ocarina's animation.

Discussion Topic:
http://www.purezc.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=44571
http://www.purezc.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=44800

Tileset by Radien and Akkabus
Screen design and item sprites by Sheik
Scripting by Joe123
